title: Four shot, one dead, in home invasion near Plaza
content:
One man was killed and three other people were shot in a home in the 4900 block of Brookside Boulevard in Kansas City late Thursday night.
Police said two suspects entered the home just before 11:30 p.m. One man in the home was shot and was pronounced dead at the scene. Another man was shot and was in critical condition. Two females in the home also were shot and had non-life-threatening injuries.
Police did not immediately release any further details. But they asked that anyone with information call the Tips Hotline at 816-474-TIPS (8477).
